name: Awaken
text:
Awaken

A light was shone,
From mine to throne
And alas, can hearts be stone?

Twas sent a word,
The call was heard
But not a single soul was stirred.

The word was told,
Through the lands of cold
But nary a man was bold.
The rumors were spread
And charters were read
And all who supported them were dead.

But in the dark,
Young reader, hark!
Wisdom now is lit with a spark.

When you find the flame
'Tis the Dres to blame.
Is all this life a game?
